PRODUCTS Image Speech Text SERVICE Data Collection Data Annotation Our team has more than 10 years of experience in the data industry, has a deep understanding of customer needs, and is able to support special data collection and annotation projects. We have patents on speech pre-recognition technology, key points & segmentation annotation of human faces, data pre-recognition and processing technology based on Human-in-the-loop,etc. Our professional QA team has 7 years of experience in project management and QA by taking multi-rounds of QA to guarantee the accuracy rate up to 96%-99%. We provide data solution consulting services at 24/7, standby service and regular return visits to improve efficiency. DATA SECURITY AND COMPLIANCE ISO 27001 Certified With the continuous development of information technology in the world, information security has gradually drawn everyone's attention.At present, the British standard ISO 27001:2005 has become the worldwide standard and widely used in of information security management. The latest version is ISO 27001:2013. In August 2019, Datatang obtained the Certification of ISO 27001:2013 , which assures Datatang's products and services meet the requirements of the information security management system in data, network, communication, and operation. General Data Protection Regulations The General Data Protection Regulations was officially implemented on May 25. 2018, in EU member countries. According to the GDPR regulations on personal confidential data, the processing of privacy data requires explicit consent from the data subject. Datatang and its subsidiaries comply with and strictly abide by GDPR's requirements to protect individuals from privacy and data breaches. The General Data Protection Regulations was officially implemented on May 25. 2018, in EU member countries. According to the GDPR regulations on personal confidential data, the processing of privacy data requires explicit consent from the data subject. Datatang and its subsidiaries comply with and strictly abide by GDPR's requirements to protect individuals from privacy and data breaches. Data Protection Officer System To ensure the compliance of the business of Datatang and further protect data security and personal information, Datatang has set up a data protection officer system. The data protection officer is responsible for maintaining real-time communication with the regulatory authorities, ensuring the safety of the company's and its subsidiaries' data security management systems, formulating contingency plans for data security incidents, and comprehensively ensuring data security and business compliance. To ensure the compliance of the business of Datatang and further protect data security and personal information, Datatang has set up a data protection officer system. The data protection officer is responsible for maintaining real-time communication with the regulatory authorities, ensuring the safety of the company's and its subsidiaries' data security management systems, formulating contingency plans for data security incidents, and comprehensively ensuring data security and business compliance. Data Collection Informed Authorization According to the requirements of the 'Data Service Specification,' the basic principle of data protection is that the data collection or annotation service must obtain the authorization of the collected subject. The authorization must clearly inform the collected person of the content collected, the purpose of use, and the scope of application. The data cleaning standard is that the data must be processed till a specific individual cannot be identified or be recovered. Datatang has 10+ years of experience in project implementation and quality and safety control, ensuring that customers' projects are completed within the specified time and specified quality requirements With professional collection equipment and implementation team, Datatang support various types of smart home data collection. Tailored Data Service for Smart Home Datatang collects annotated voice and image data for smart home scenarios, enabling precise interaction with smart home devices. Far-field Speech Recognition Support multi-language and multi-device collection of data data collection and labeling of text, noise, and speaker roles. Gesture Control Support static and dynamic hand gesture data collection and annotation of landmarks, attributes and gesture types. Human Behavior Recognition Support multi-device, multi-scene and multi-angle human behavior data collection and labeling of human locations, landmarks, behaviors and attributes. Object Detection Supports indoor scene image collection and labeling of object classification, segmentation, and state recognition. Anomaly Detection Support the image collection and annotation of a veriety types of abnormal behavior. The customer wants to enrich the voice commands in their newly launched smart speaker to allow users to control their smart home devices with voice. Datatang collected data of 10,000 people, covering eight dialects and age from 3 to 50 years old. The task is efficiently completed through our annotation platform, which has online audio automatic quality inspection function and support data upload functions through API. Voice Command Recognition for Smart Home The client wants to improve the scene recognition and detection technology of the sweeping robot, and needs to capture more than 200 home scenes. With years of experience in project management and implementation, Datatang collected 600,000 images and integrated 160 labels into 4 groups of large labels(each of large labels contains 5-38 small category labels), after that we annotated the images. Scene Recognition for Smart Home The customer wants to enrich the voice commands in their newly launched smart speaker to allow users to control their smart home devices with voice. Datatang collected data of 10,000 people, covering eight dialects and age from 3 to 50 years old. The task is efficiently completed through our annotation platform, which has online audio automatic quality inspection function and support data upload functions through API. Voice Command Recognition for Smart Home The client wants to improve the scene recognition and detection technology of the sweeping robot, and needs to capture more than 200 home scenes. With years of experience in project management and implementation, Datatang collected 600,000 images and integrated 160 labels into 4 groups of large labels(each of large labels contains 5-38 small category labels), after that we annotated the images. Scene Recognition for Smart Home Why Datatang One-stop Data Service Datatang.ai provides comprehensive data annotation and collection services to help you succeed with your AI projects. Data QA System Datatang delivers high-quality data with intelligent self-inspection, multiple quality checks, and ISO9001 certification. Rich Annotation tools 30 proven annotation tools for full coverage of voice, image video, 3D point cloud and text data annotation requirements. Compliance & Security We follows Personal Information Protection Act, GDPR, ISO27001/ISO27701 for security and regulatory compliance.
